errors.error_description: The format specified for `requirements-nonpy.txt` is incorrect, using a comma instead of a double colon `::` as a separator, which will cause dependency parsing to fail.
The example `.plugin` file is missing the `[Core]` section header, which is a required part of the INI file format and will lead to a parsing error.
correction_candidates:
Replace the incorrect `ini` block with:
```ini
[Core]
Name = plugin-name
Module = plugin-name
Tests = test-suite

[Nikola]
MinVersion = version-number
MaxVersion = version-number
Compiler = compiler-that-uses-extensions
PluginCategory = plugin-category

[Documentation]
Author = authors-name
Version = version-number
Website = https://plugins.getnikola.com/#plugin-name
Description = A short, one-line description
```

Replace the incorrect `ini` block with:
```ini
[Plugin]
Name = plugin-name
Module = plugin-name
Tests = test-suite

[Nikola]
MinVersion = version-number
MaxVersion = version-number
Compiler = compiler-that-uses-extensions
PluginCategory = plugin-category

[Documentation]
Author = authors-name
Version = version-number
Website = https://plugins.getnikola.com/#plugin-name
Description = A short, one-line description
```

Replace the incorrect `ini` block with:
```ini
[Nikola]
Name = plugin-name
Module = plugin-name
Tests = test-suite
MinVersion = version-number
MaxVersion = version-number
Compiler = compiler-that-uses-extensions
PluginCategory = plugin-category

[Documentation]
Author = authors-name
Version = version-number
Website = https://plugins.getnikola.com/#plugin-name
Description = A short, one-line description
```

Replace the incorrect `ini` block with:
```yaml
Core:
  Name: plugin-name
  Module: plugin-name
  Tests: test-suite

Nikola:
  MinVersion: version-number
...
```
errors.golden_answer:
Replace the incorrect `ini` block with:
```ini
[Core]
Name = plugin-name
Module = plugin-name
Tests = test-suite

[Nikola]
MinVersion = version-number
MaxVersion = version-number
Compiler = compiler-that-uses-extensions
PluginCategory = plugin-category

[Documentation]
Author = authors-name
Version = version-number
Website = https://plugins.getnikola.com/#plugin-name
Description = A short, one-line description
```
